item.description:
Hi folks! We have a meeting scheduled for next week!

I will be giving a short (30min) talk on Rake and it's wonderfulness. Should mostly be an intro, but will be happy to cover any thing that I can about it.

Casey Rosenthal will be filling in the rest of the night, all though I am not sure what he will be covering. I'll try to post an update later today to fill in the details! Sorry about that, but I hope to see you all there.

Also, for those interested I would like to try and continue the tradition of heading down to the restaurant down the hall to have a bit more 'light hearted' conversation over good food and beverages. All are welcome!

-Nick

group.name: The Portland Maine Ruby Meetup Group

item.name: Meeting Next Week
